title: Wages_Of_War-MONTE
description:
Turn-based strategy/war game. You control a squad of mercenaries through a series of objective-based missions. The game is set in the near future and the world is politically fragmented with terrorists organizations and drug barons flourishing. The game employs a money system, you get payments before and after jobs and have to pay for background information and equipment. You view the in-mission arena from an overhead perspective. You control each member of your six or seven man squad individually. Each one has a set number of action points per turn. A large selection of actions are available and each one has a points value. The game&#039;s graphics and control system are good.


I seed old games. :)
